title: How to Make Cute Invitations

steps.headline: Figure out what theme you want.
steps.description: It can be Pokémon, anime, kawaii, cats, or puppies! Anything you can think of that is cute!

steps.headline: Figure out the color or patterns you want on the invitation.
steps.description: If it is kawaii themed, it can have pastel colors. If Pokémon, use lighting bolts, or poke balls!

steps.headline: Lay out a blank piece of paper.
steps.description: Fold it in half, or any other cool folds! Color the paper if you wish, or you can print out a design if the up interned and glue it on the blank piece of paper. The patterned or colored side of the paper will be the outside of the invitation.

steps.headline: Decorating the invitation(s) on the outside.
steps.description: If you are going to use a kawaii theme, print some really cute photos. Then you can cut it out, and glue them to the paper on the outside! You can draw things too! Or you can use stickers and glitter! That would be really cute!

steps.headline: Writing in the inside.
steps.description: In the inside, it is blank. You can write something like this: You are invited! Date:? Place:? Time:? Hope you can come!

steps.headline: Or, you can write something on your own!
Decorating in the inside.
steps.description: You can outline the words you wrote with glitter glue or markers! Print out some pictures! Glue the pictures! Draw some pictures! Make it unique!

steps.headline: Decorate the envelope with stickers, glitter, pictures, drawings, or you can even tape a treat on it like a lollipop or something small!
Put the invitation in the envelope!
Make more cute invitations!
steps.description: Make them all different! Not all invitations can be the same! But, keep it one theme only!

text: Figure out what theme you want. It can be Pokémon, anime, kawaii, cats, or puppies! Anything you can think of that is cute! Figure out the color or patterns you want on the invitation. If it is kawaii themed, it can have pastel colors. If Pokémon, use lighting bolts, or poke balls! Get your supplies.  Lay out a blank piece of paper. Fold it in half, or any other cool folds! Color the paper if you wish, or you can print out a design if the up interned and glue it on the blank piece of paper. The patterned or colored side of the paper will be the outside of the invitation. Decorating the invitation(s) on the outside. If you are going to use a kawaii theme, print some really cute photos. Then you can cut it out, and glue them to the paper on the outside! You can draw things too! Or you can use stickers and glitter! That would be really cute! Allow to dry.  Writing in the inside. In the inside, it is blank. You can write something like this: You are invited! Date:? Place:? Time:? Hope you can come! Or, you can write something on your own!  Decorating in the inside. You can outline the words you wrote with glitter glue or markers! Print out some pictures! Glue the pictures! Draw some pictures! Make it unique! Allow to dry.  Decorate the envelope with stickers, glitter, pictures, drawings, or you can even tape a treat on it like a lollipop or something small!  Put the invitation in the envelope!  Make more cute invitations! Make them all different! Not all invitations can be the same! But, keep it one theme only! Have fun!
